photographers.name: Ansel Adams
photographers.description: Ansel Easton Adams (February 20, 1902 – April 22, 1984) was an American photographer and environmentalist.

photographers.name: Dorothea Lange
photographers.description: Dorothea Lange (May 26, 1895 – October 11, 1965) was an American documentary photographer and photojournalist.

photographers.name: Henri Cartier-Bresson
photographers.description: Henri Cartier-Bresson (August 22, 1908 – August 3, 2004) was a French humanist photographer considered a master of candid photography.
